echo ¦sed¦'s/main$/main universe/' -i /etc/apt/sources.list && apt-get update -qq && echo 'Installing OS dependencies' && apt-get install -qq -y --fix-missing sudo software-properties-common git libxext-dev libxrender-dev libxslt1.1 libxtst-dev ... :: Filesystem_operation
